discharge_note:
Discharge Note for Darth Vader

During today's consultation, Darth Vader was observed to be doing a lot better. His cough has stopped, and he has started running and playing. He is eating food without issues and seems better and more lively overall.

No further medications or specific treatments were prescribed during this visit.

Next steps:
- Continue monitoring Darth Vader's behavior and eating habits.
- Ensure he remains active and healthy.
- Schedule a follow-up appointment if any unusual symptoms reappear or if you have concerns about his health.

If you have any questions or concerns, do not hesitate to contact the veterinary clinic.
